fullForm: Banaras Hindu University Undergraduate Entrance Test (Agriculture)
eligibility: Candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent examination with Physics, Chemistry, and Biology/Mathematics/Agriculture from a recognized board. Minimum percentage and age requirements as per BHU and CUET-UG norms.

faqs.question: How do I apply for BHU B.Sc. (Hons.) Agriculture admission?
faqs.answer: Candidates must register and appear for the CUET-UG exam, select BHU as a preferred university, and participate in the BHU counseling process for Agriculture courses.
